name: Snowfall (Lim Ding Wen)
description:
Snowfall is a 3D action game set in medieval times, about a mage who had his chance to escape from prison. The game features three levels -- one focused on stealth, one on escape and a final boss level. It features a variety of spells such as freezing, fire, healing, and life draining.

Programming by Lim Ding Wen and Chen Yu. Environment by Kenze Wee.
